1.content:
"Wallace, the bus is here! You're going to be late!"

With a groan, Wallace awoke. He was stiff, hunched over. Sitting up, the medical textbook glued to his cheek with drool came with him. He'd fallen asleep studying again. He peeled the book off his face and set it down, blinking bleerily around the room.

"Wallace!"
1.title: Work in progress - do not add

info.brief_description: Working your way to the top of the cut-throat plastic surgery industry
info.description:
Wallace Dickinson
15-year-old medical prodigy. Having been fast-tracked through medical college, he is well on his way to achieving his dream of becoming the world's youngest Plastic surgeon.
